explanation: Zoe claims she went to The Waves concert at the Riverside Amphitheater Thursday evening. But Clue 3 reveals the concert was postponed to the following week due to weather -- no show took place Thursday night. Zoe lied about her entire evening plans. With the markers still present at 6:30 PM (Clue 1) and the ransom note printed at 7:48 PM (Clue 2), Zoe had the window and the motive as the leader of the failed vending machine petition to collect all forty-eight markers and leave the ransom note demanding better snacks.
funFact: The average office whiteboard marker lasts about two weeks before going dry, making them one of the most frequently replaced office supplies.
